attributes.action: Maintain my entire body of Inalienable Natural Rights according to the Common-Law of the Land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Notice of Understanding and Intent and Claim of Right

I, [The: Undersigned], a human with sovereign and individual spirit, do hereby make Oath and state the following is my Truth and Law,

Whereas :

The UK is a common law jurisdiction, equality before the law is paramount and mandatory,

Therefore to all interested parties, I, [The: Undersigned] am a Freeman and serve notice my intent to lawfully exist free of all statutory obligations and restrictions and I maintain all rights at law to trade, exchange or barter and exist without deceptive governance and to do so without limitations.

Claim :

I, [The: Undersigned] am a Freeman with full responsibility and not a child of the government and do not need permission to engage in lawful and peaceful activities, especially from those who claim limited liability,

Common Law jurisdiction to resolve matters of commerce with equitable remedy by estoppel.

The right to govern myself accordingly and to refuse intervention by any level of government.

Affected parties wishing to dispute these claims or make their own counterclaims must do so under Oath or attestation, upon full commercial liability and penalty of perjury.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
